newProducts.title: Memori
newProducts.description: Open-source SQL-Native memory engine for LLMs and AI agents. Provides persistent, queryable memory with one line of code. Supports SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL databases with 80-90% cost savings over vector databases.

newProducts.title: Serena
newProducts.description: A powerful coding agent toolkit providing semantic retrieval and editing capabilities for AI development tools.

newProducts.title: KiloCode
newProducts.description: Open-source VS Code AI agent with code generation, task automation, refactoring, MCP server integration, and multi-mode operation capabilities.

newProducts.title: CCPM
newProducts.description: Project management system for Claude Code using GitHub Issues and Git worktrees for parallel agent execution with context preservation and GitHub native integration.

newProducts.title: AiderDesk
newProducts.description: Desktop application for the Aider AI assistant featuring multi-project management, Git worktrees support, and IDE integration.

newProducts.title: OpenAgents
newProducts.description: Open platform for language agents featuring Data Agent for analysis, Plugins Agent with 200+ tools, and Web Agent for browsing. Includes easy deployment and chat web UI.

newProducts.title: llmfuse
newProducts.description: A self-compressing filesystem backed by an LLM, providing AI-powered file compression and retrieval capabilities.

newProducts.title: Knapsack
newProducts.description: Developer productivity platform that helps bridge the gap between design and engineering teams, recently raised $10M in funding.

whitelistUpdates.title: Series D Funding Announcement
whitelistUpdates.description: Cursor raised Series D of $2.3B and has passed $1B in annualized revenue

whitelistUpdates.title: CLI Beta Release v1.5.14
whitelistUpdates.description: Latest CLI beta release with security improvements, command validation, and config secrets handling

whitelistUpdates.title: Version 0.86.0 Release
whitelistUpdates.description: Added support for all GPT-5 models and Grok-4 via xAI integration

insights.description: LLVM adding constant-time support to protect cryptographic code from timing attacks
